Title: 14.1 Built-In Function and Operator Reference
14.6 Numeric Functions and Operators
14.6.2 Mathematical Functions
Description:
Returns the argument X, converted
            from degrees to radians. (Note that π radians equals 180
            degrees.) Returns NULL if
            X is NULL.

Press CTRL+C to copy mysql> SELECT RADIANS(90);
        -> 1.5707963267949
